content.rendered:
We are proud to announce that SearchBerg was featured on PRWEB this month as we launched White Label SEO Services for our Agency Partners. White Label Solutions are a completely different ballgame compared to traditional SEO. Very few SEO firms dare venture in this realm and even fewer actually do it right. There is very little margin for error

Our White Label SEO Strategy entails focusing on key SEO factors that bring results, tied with deliverables associated with quality of work and client retention. Our white label reporting consists of elegantly created, spectacular reports depicting the latest data from search engines and Google Analytics. All are strategies are white-hat in full compliance with Google and we employ Google certified experts to work on our client campaigns.

And if that’s not enough, all our Agency Partners get full, free access to the Agency Dashboard where they can monitor all projects activities related to their clients. And that’s not all. SearchBerg also provides Client Dashboard access to the clients of Agency Partner’s clients sporting the Agency Partners name and logo thereby strengthening and promoting their brand.

We are seeing an encouraging number of inquiries from design agencies and other internet marketing firms interested in white label SEO services for their clients. Call SearchBerg and get started today!

To view the full release on PR Web, please click here.
